segments.text: This is the last of the milk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I intend to go to the store today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you get some of that new cereal we saw advertised on TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know ... the one with the silly ad about how vitamins jump up and down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll see . Sometimes the stores don't have some of the new kinds of cereal .
segments.speaker: S2
